Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for 12th and 13th Generation Intel(R) Core(TM) Processor - V1.22

Events.BriefDescription: Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_OCCUPANCY.RD]
Events.PublicDescription: Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_OCCUPANCY.RD]

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_REQUESTS.RD]
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_REQUESTS.RD]

Events.BriefDescription: This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_DAT_OCCUPANCY.ALL
Events.PublicDescription: This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_DAT_OCCUPANCY.ALL

Events.BriefDescription: Each cycle counts number of any coherent request at memory controller that were issued by any core.
Events.PublicDescription: Each cycle counts number of any coherent request at memory controller that were issued by any core.

Events.BriefDescription: This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD
Events.PublicDescription: This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD

Events.BriefDescription: Each cycle counts number of coherent reads pending on data return from memory controller that were issued by any core.
Events.PublicDescription: Each cycle counts number of coherent reads pending on data return from memory controller that were issued by any core.

Events.BriefDescription: Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_OCCUPANCY.DRD]
Events.PublicDescription: Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_OCCUPANCY.DRD]

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD]
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD]
